description: This file defines the TransactionsScreen widget and associated classes, managing a list of financial transactions with add/edit/delete capabilities in a Flutter app.

classes.name: TransactionsScreen
classes.description: Main widget displaying the list of transactions with functionalities to add, edit, delete, and refresh transactions.

classes.name: TransactionFormDialog
classes.description: Dialog widget for creating or editing a transaction, including form fields and validation.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for TransactionsScreen, including list rendering and user interactions.

methods.name: showTxForm
methods.description: Displays the form dialog for adding or editing a transaction.

methods.name: _prettyDate
methods.description: Formats a DateTime into a user-friendly string.

methods.name: _monthStr
methods.description: Returns the abbreviated month name for a given month number.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes the state of TransactionFormDialog with existing transaction data if available.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Constructs the dialog UI for transaction creation/editing, handling input fields, validation, and submission.

methods.name: submit
methods.description: Handles form submission to create or update a transaction via CRUD provider.
